string.name: wp_mydocuments_activity_title
string.context: Title for the My Documents activity

string.name: wp_mydocuments_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the my documents activity to the patient. %%MYDOCUMENTS is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%MYDOCUMENTS lets you sign new forms and see those you have already signed.

string.name: wp_mydocuments_tutorial_overview_2
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the patient the section of forms that have to be signed by the patient.

resources.string: Forms at the top are ready for you to fill out. After you submit a form, your care team will review it before it is filed to your chart.

string.name: wp_mydocuments_tutorial_overview_2_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the proxy the section of forms that have to be signed by the patient.

resources.string: Forms at the top are ready for you to fill out. After you submit a form, %%PATNAME\'s care team will review it before it is filed to %%PATNAME\'s chart.

string.name: wp_mydocuments_tutorial_overview_3
string.context: Tutorial text explaining the section of completed forms that are available to be viewed by the patient.

resources.string: Below are the forms on file you have already completed. Tap on a form to review it.
